products.title: Rebel Thunder
products.description: Rebel thunder made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

products.title: Lux Thunder Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Legacy Graphite 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. This dark grey vertical blind is bang on trend so will add a stylish, elegant and modern feel to any room in your home. Product id: sdb-vtb0966 fabric colour: graphite material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes legacy graphite 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Lux Dark Thunder Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, the vanes will block the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Rebel Thunder Vertical Blind
products.description: The cracked/ marble effect provides a textured look and feel to the fabric. Available in other colours. Rebel thunder vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Semana Thunder Vertical Blind

products.title: Legacy Thunder
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
